ygData.subject: Re: level 12 necro.. about time!
ygData.msgSnippet: Are there a lot of undead in Lavastorm??? ... From: James  To:  Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 6:45 AM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
Are there a lot of undead in Lavastorm???



----- Original Message -----
From: James <manickd@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 6:45 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] level 12 necro.. about time!


> From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> How do you go there from say the swash buckler in the cave. Can you give
me
> some directions pleas? Thanks.....
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Alex <potat@...>
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 1:13 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] level 12 necro.. about time!
>
>
> >From: "Alex" <potat@...>
> >
> >I would definately go to Lavastorm, and you can stay there for the next 4
> >levels, at least. The experience is great, the loot is wonderful, there
> are
> >words to be found here, and it is grossly underpopulated. Just make sure
> >you either have a summoned dagger for your skeleton or it is level 12,
> since
> >there are many magical creatures here. It also helps to have a RTS with
> >vampiric embrace.
> >
> >
